content: latest version is **raeaug25** please download this copy if you have an older version **errata ** work row 2 of body after completing set-up row **step by step video tutorial** is now available on youtube https //www tinyurl com/raeslace rae s lace baby blanket is a simple lace knitting pattern with garter stitch borders it measures 35 in | 89 cm square but you can easily adjust the size to your specifications by adjusting the number of pattern repeats in the body of the blanket **yardage requirements** circulo anne in off-white 280 g | 1042 yd i suggest that you over budget on the amount of yardage necessary to complete the project as each knitter knits differently and there may be a discrepancy in the actual amount of yarn used please email me at yellowcayenne@icloud com or send me a message on instagram @yellowcayenne if you have any questions on this pattern this gratuitous pattern has not been tested nor tech edited
